sub_title: Deputy Production Manager at Bunge Loders Croklaan
summary: Brazilian, living in the Netherlands. Holding bachelor in chemical engineering and master in safety and process safety engineering. Work experience of 10 years being: 2 years in Operations at Procter & Gamble. 8 in Safety and Process Safety at Bunge. Recently back to Operations and proudly member of Production management team at one of Bunge's manufacturing sites of plant-based specialty oils and fats. Fully convinced the magic happens outside the comfort zone and everything is easier with a positive mindset. Driven by challenges, learnings and people.

profile_positions.description: Part of production management team and currently responsible for managing Dry and Solvent Fractionation factories
profile_positions.title: Deputy Production Manager

profile_positions.description:
Global Process Safety Manager B2B Oils, reporting to B2B Oils Operations Vice President. In charge of: 
- Global prioritization of projects related to process safety to achieve high reliability, process safety, and reduce down time related to process incidents
- Identifying critical risks to the business under process safety, develop and execute roadmaps based on high risks with high impact to the business
- Develop and deploy safety process standards for high risk processes
- Risk Assessment
- Streamline safety-related activities and ensure BLC initiatives are executed according to Bunge standards and procedures 
- Drive the implementation of the corporate safety policy, procedures and practices for BLC EMEA & Asia; 
- Develop, implement, and drive the safety programs (including global programs) in order to achieve and maintain the goal of zero safety incidents; 
- Conduct regular safety performance reviews and assessments & follow-ups to ensure that BLC locations are in compliance with Corporate & Regulatory.
profile_positions.title: Global Process Safety Manager

profile_positions.description:
Global Process Safety Leader, reporting to Senior Director Global Safety
o	Leading global process safety team, global prioritization of the Capex and Opex projects related to process safety to achieve high reliability, process safety, and reduce down time related to process incidents
o	Identifying critical risks to the business under process safety, develop and execute roadmaps based on high risks with high impact to the business
o	Developed and modified safety process standard for ammonia system, hydrogenation plants, hexane and dust explosion
o	Visited high risks sites in SA, Malaysia, Europe and US to provide technical support and leadership in process safety with focus on high impact process incident reduction
o	Developed new global reporting standards for process incidents to increase visibility, data integrity and urgency, effective classification, thorough incident investigation, including the cost impact on the business and down time
o	Identified weaknesses globally in PSM by elements to allow accurate and effective prioritization of projects.
o	Lead and participated in several PHA analysis & training for Europe, Asia & SA
o	Lead and participated in several incident investigations in ammonia, fire and dust explosion and fatal incidents

Bunge South America (BSA) Process Safety Leader, reporting to SA Safety Director 
o	Implementation of global guidelines at South America sites
o	Focus on updating engineering document (P&IDs) and reviewing MOC practices, Pre-Startup Safety Review (PSSR), inspection and maintenance routines for critical instruments for Soybean Oil Extraction Plants and Refineries
o	Development of HAZOP Study in Soybean Oil Extraction Plants with hexane as the subject of the postgraduate monograph on Safety Engineering
o	Leading all process incident investigations, providing final reports for Global Safety
o	Participating in Global strategy meetings, presenting to the CEO and presidents
profile_positions.title: Process Safety Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Standardization of safety standards at the national level following the elements of the OHSAS 18001 Management System
•	Leading implementation and roll out of global and national safety campaigns in SA
•	Participated and lead in several safety audits. Played a critical role in focusing on risk identification and providing solutions to the sites. 
•	Participated in fatality incident investigation in Romania and SA, providing expertise to assist in root cause identification and effective corrective actions both globally and regionally. 
•	Project Management Officer for Vice-Presidency safety projects
•	Review of Capex projects related to Process Safety to ensure appropriate prioritization, contractor selection and on time implementation
•	Lead training on process safety, MOC, and investigations. 
•	Worked closely with Global safety leader in headquarter to develop effective communication programs for SA to ensure the message is capturing the heart and mind of the workforce.


Trainings:
•	Root Cause Analysis by Sologic - August / 15
•	Process Hazard Analysis by DNV - November / 16
•	Behavioral Observation by Dupont - May / 17
profile_positions.title: Safety Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Job Rotation Internship at the Louveira Plant 
•	Capital control of plant projects
•	Optimization of pads production process
o	Inventory Reduction and Loss Analysis
•	Project Manager of installation of a new line of air conditioning and replacement of palletizer machine (Pampers Production Department)
•	Part of Sustainability Committee
•	Presentation to plant leadership at the end of each job rotation step
profile_positions.title: Intern
